description.p: AeroFTP is a modern multi-protocol file transfer client built with Tauri. It supports FTP, FTPS, SFTP, WebDAV, S3-compatible storage, and cloud providers including Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive, and MEGA.

ul.li: 51 languages with RTL support (Arabic, Hebrew, Persian, Urdu)
AeroCloud - Turn any FTP server into your personal cloud
Multi-protocol: FTP, FTPS, SFTP, WebDAV, S3, Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive, MEGA
Smart Overwrite Dialog with file comparison view
Properties Dialog with checksum calculation (MD5/SHA-256)
Compress and extract ZIP archives
Drag and drop file organization
Dual-pane file browser with list and grid views
Integrated DevTools: Monaco code editor, terminal, AI assistant
Built-in media player and image preview
Multi-session tabs with connection persistence
Activity Log with real-time transfer monitoring

description.p: Built with Rust (Tauri 2) and React 18/TypeScript. Open source under GPL-3.0 license.
